text: DEQX is an Australian-based company that develops digital loudspeaker and room correction technology. The name is an acronym for Digital Equalization and Crossover. DEQX processors correct loudspeaker distortion,http://www.soundandvision.com/content/deqx-speaker-correction- rmaf’s-most-amazing-demo#jRXPkMcwwx7gGIUB.97 and also apply room compensation as required. The company's equipment is used by notable companies in the recording industry, including Jeff Rowland Design Group in the USA and Abbey Road Mastering Studios in the UK. ==References== Category:Loudspeaker manufacturers Category:Audio equipment manufacturers of Australia
title: DEQX
